definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: The company portrays itself as the fastest growing online car-rental agency on earth.
sentences.chinese: 該公司是目前增長速度最快的在線租車代理商。

sentences.english: Our company is often the forest Limited liability company in the Tangshan area business agent.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是常林股份有限公司在唐山地區的代理商。

sentences.english: We will provide the necessary equipment, such as information services to the probation agents.
sentences.chinese: 我們爲代理商提供試用裝等必要的宣傳資料服務。

sentences.english: By agent, I mean that your company may sell the products on behalf of my company and receives commisions .
sentences.chinese: 代理商指的是貴公司以抽佣金方式賣我公司的產品。

sentences.english: Non-price agreements between a manufacturer and a dealer.
sentences.chinese: 製造商和代理商間的非價格協定。

sentences.english: Set up a market observer, protect agent's exclusive interests strictly .
sentences.chinese: 設立市場監測員，嚴格保護代理商獨家利益。

sentences.english: Have become the authorization business agent of many well-known and correlated material manufacturers in the meantime.
sentences.chinese: 同時已成爲多家知名相關材料廠商的授權代理商。

sentences.english: He claims that neither the truck nor its driver belonged to his company.
sentences.chinese: 這位代理商大聲說道，卡車和司機都不屬於他的公司。

sentences.english: Have you had more discussions with the British agent?
sentences.chinese: 你們和英國的代理商進一步談了嗎？

sentences.english: He got rid of NutriSystem's ad agency.
sentences.chinese: 他拋棄了NutriSystem的廣告代理商。

sentences.english: Interlink Equipment Inc. is an international distributor of USED earthmoving-roadbuilding and construction equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我們是二手重土築路和工程設備行業的世界代理商。

sentences.english: The action was taken after tests confirmed the initial diagnosis, the agency said.
sentences.chinese: 這據代理商說這個行動被精切診斷後就採取了。

sentences.english: At the same time, the background of Recruitment Huasheng agents throughout the country, joined in the heat.
sentences.chinese: 同時，華勝背景誠招全國各地代理商，火熱加盟中。

sentences.english: We are the singapore trading company are looking for the long-term sincere reliable supplier.
sentences.chinese: 我們是新加坡代理商正在尋找長期真誠可靠的供應商。

sentences.english: Safeco relies on a large national network of independent agents and brokers to help customers identify their best possible coverage.
sentences.chinese: Safeco建設了一個全國性的代理商網絡。

sentences.english: We hope the sales quantity not less than 500MT per year for the agent.
sentences.chinese: 要求區域代理商年經銷量不低於500噸。

definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position/to act as an agent or proxy/surrogate/(computing) proxy
